verses.t: God{H430} be merciful{H2603} unto us, and bless{H1288} us; and cause his face{H6440} to shine{H215} upon us; Selah{H5542}.chiefâ€¦: or, overseerupon: Heb. with
That thy way{H1870} may be known{H3045} upon earth{H776}, thy saving health{H3444} among all nations{H1471}.
Let the people{H5971} praise{H3034} thee, O God{H430}; let all the people{H5971} praise{H3034} thee.

O let the nations{H3816} be glad{H8055} and sing for joy{H7442}: for thou shalt judge{H8199} the people{H5971} righteously{H4334}, and govern{H5148} the nations{H3816} upon earth{H776}. Selah{H5542}.govern: Heb. lead
Let the people{H5971} praise{H3034} thee, O God{H430}; let all the people{H5971} praise{H3034} thee.
Then shall the earth{H776} yield{H5414} her increase{H2981}; and God{H430}, even our own God{H430}, shall bless{H1288} us.
God{H430} shall bless{H1288} us; and all the ends{H657} of the earth{H776} shall fear{H3372} him.
